body:
Ruqqie should be cute, customizable, artistic, and of a discernable species like the Snoo. Ruqqie should not be a box; it is barely even cute. That's lame.  Any and many companies just have some kind of colored box as a mascot or that they use in company videos - Ruqqie is not distinct. The Snoo is iconic - it is obvious what it is and the company that it's affiliated with.

Also, Ruqqie should not be Ruqqie - Ruqqie should be **a** ruqqie. Similar to a maj or a snoo. So that we can all be individual ruqqies.

Perhaps ruqqies should be shaped more like blobs if we're going with the 3d shape thing. Or maybe Ruqqie should be some kind of mythical creature to add a fantasy element to the medieval theme.

So, there are my criticisms and suggestions regarding ruqqie. 

Also, rectangle Ruqqie is fat. Ew.

A kind stranger has provided me with 6 coins and ive wanted to put on this competition for a while now, basically users will redesign the current website mascot "Ruqqie" and the best submissions will be awarded with a coin. Let me know if I should add more rules but for now, you cannot copy the current shape, Ruqqie must not be a rectangle.

There are currently 16 coins in the prize pool, breakdown:

@nerds - 7

@CanIGetAHellYeah - 6

@VILLAIN - 6

@kek - 2

@carpathianflorist - 1

@no_chill - 1

@Madje - 1

Winnings will be shared amongst the top 3 submissions.
